directions: [["Saute the butter and garlic in the pot for 1 minute."],["Add broccoli, potatoes, and broth. Season with salt and pepper."],["Secure lid and cook at high pressure for 10 minutes. Turn off pot and let pressure naturally release for 10 minutes. Quick-release the remaining pressure."],["Add cooked bacon if desired."],["Add the half and half, cheddar cheese, and blend with immersion blender until smooth. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
